sqlQuery.name: Organism
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT ga.organism AS term, ga.organism AS display, ga.organism AS internal FROM CBIL.GeneAttributes ga, ($$answerIdSql$$) r WHERE ga.source_id = r.source_id ORDER BY ga.organism ASC

sqlQuery.name: Experiment
sqlQuery.sql: WITH re AS ( SELECT p.dataset_id FROM ErythronDB.Profile p, Study.Study s, ($$stepParamValuesSql$$) pv WHERE pv.name = 'experiment' AND pv.value = s.source_id AND s.study_id = p.dataset_id AND ((p.title LIKE '%Gene%' or p.title LIKE '%Protein%') AND p.title NOT LIKE '%Average%')), re_final AS ( SELECT * FROM re UNION SELECT -1 AS dataset_id WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM re)), Experiments AS (SELECT dataset_id AS term, dataset_id AS internal, dataset || ' (' || num_genes::text || ')' AS display, ranked_investigation_id, is_comprehensive, order_num FROM (SELECT p.dataset_id, replace(replace(split_part(p.title, ': ', 1), '(Mm)', ''), '(Hs)', '') || CASE WHEN (p.display->>'record')::boolean THEN '' ELSE '*' END AS dataset, p.order_num, CASE WHEN p.dataset_id = (SELECT dataset_id FROM re) THEN -1 * s.investigation_id ELSE s.investigation_id END AS ranked_investigation_id, s.investigation_id, (p.display->>'record')::boolean AS is_comprehensive, COUNT(DISTINCT ids.source_id) AS num_genes FROM ErythronDB.GeneExpressionDataTable ge, Study.Study s, ($$answerIdSql$$) ids, ErythronDB.Profile p WHERE ids.source_id = ge.gene_source_id AND p.profile_id = ge.profile_id AND p.dataset_id = s.study_id GROUP BY p.dataset_id, dataset, order_num, investigation_id, is_comprehensive ORDER BY ranked_investigation_id, is_comprehensive, order_num) a) SELECT * FROM Experiments UNION SELECT 0 AS term, 0 AS internal, 'None' AS display, 1 AS ranked_investigation_id, true AS is_comprehensive, 1 AS order_num WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM Experiments) ORDER BY ranked_investigation_id, is_comprehensive, order_num

sqlQuery.name: RecommendedExperiment
sqlQuery.sql: WITH re AS ( SELECT s.source_id AS term, s.source_id AS internal, replace(replace(split_part(p.title, ': ', 1), '(Mm)', ''), '(Hs)', '') || CASE WHEN (p.display->>'record')::boolean THEN '' ELSE '*' END AS display FROM ErythronDB.Profile p, Study.Study s, ($$stepParamValuesSql$$) pv WHERE pv.name = 'experiment' AND pv.value = s.source_id AND s.study_id = p.dataset_id AND ((p.title LIKE '%Gene%' or p.title LIKE '%Protein%') AND p.title NOT LIKE '%Average%')) SELECT * FROM re UNION SELECT 'None' AS term, 'None' AS internal, 'None' AS display WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM re)
